entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
